body: I saw that the on/off selection keys for NSFW and other settings have become compatible with Windows 10 High Contrast themes, but the guild's color selection box is not yet compatible with High Contrast themes, you can't see nothing.
body_html: I saw that the on/off selection keys for NSFW and other settings have become compatible with Windows 10 High Contrast themes, but the guild's color selection box is not yet compatible with High Contrast themes, you can't see nothing.

title: Selecting the guild color is problematic in High Contrast mode.

author.bio:

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: Are you talking about the text box where you type the color code in, or the entire field? If it's only the former I forgot to set an HTML class used by other text boxes on ruqqus, a side effect is that it stays white even in dark mode. I don't know but it's possible that could affect it on high contrast themes as well.
body_html: Are you talking about the text box where you type the color code in, or the entire field? If it's only the former I forgot to set an HTML class used by other text boxes on ruqqus, a side effect is that it stays white even in dark mode. I don't know but it's possible that could affect it on high contrast themes as well.

body:
See, this can be easily tested on a virtual machine, if you are not a Windows user.

The color bars or something like that is all invisible (I don't even know if they are bars or selection boxes, because I can't see), but the text input box where the color code is entered is visible.
body_html:
See, this can be easily tested on a virtual machine, if you are not a Windows user.

The color bars or something like that is all invisible (I don't even know if they are bars or selection boxes, because I can't see), but the text input box where the color code is entered is visible.
